abstract: The effectiveness of automated process control systems (APCS) and supervisory control and data acquisition systems (SCADA) information security depends on the applied protection technologies of transport environment data transmission components. This article investigates the problems of detecting attacks in wireless sensor networks (WSN) of SCADA systems. As a result of analytical studies, the authors developed the detailed classification of external attacks and intrusion detection in sensor networks and brought a detailed description of attacking impacts on components of SCADA systems in accordance with the selected directions of attacks.
